meanings.definition: A person who attends horse races.
meanings.sent1: The racegoer cheered loudly as the horses crossed the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The racegoer brought binoculars to get a better view of the race.
meanings.sent3: The racegoer accidentally wore a hat that looked like a jockey's helmet.
meanings.sent4: The racegoer's excitement was like a horse galloping at full speed.
meanings.sent5: The racegoer's passion for horse races was unmatched by anyone else in the crowd.

meanings.definition: One who goes to watch races.
meanings.sent1: Every racegoer eagerly awaited the start of the next race.
meanings.sent2: The racegoer enjoyed the thrill of watching cars speed around the track.
meanings.sent3: The racegoer brought a homemade sign to support their favorite racer.
meanings.sent4: The racegoer's dedication to attending races was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The racegoer's love for watching races was evident in their enthusiastic clapping.
